Text: Northpole Throwdown and Was It Worth It? are glitchy, but in all honesty, I really don't think I care. This album is just as bad as Blooddrunk. Every song sounds the same. Thanks for the upload tho', without this, I couldn't make up my mind if to buy the album new, used, or at all.
why didn't you include track 10? just cos you didn't like it?
